ygData.msgSnippet: Cleans glasses Ah, much better now. Oh yeah. Now I can see the posts. ... She smiled. She could believe this bot offered to carry her.  She chuckled. We

Cleans glasses "Ah, much better now. Oh yeah. Now I can see the 
posts."

::Spears::

She smiled. She could believe this bot offered to carry her.  She 
chuckled. "We still have a long way to walk don't we?  That's an 
awefully long way to carry me." She walked up to him and kissed him 
on the cheek. "But thanks for the sweet offer."  She continued 
walking towards the base. Only now, she wasn't quite walking, she was 
almost floating. She smiled and walked on.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker chuckles, frowning a bit as he sees Spears wince. "No, not 
the Ark, 
> the Cybertronian Fire. We recently moved there from the Ark. The 
engines are 
> shot there as well, but other than that, its fully fuctional."
> 
> He transforms into robot mode, looking at Spears. "Would it be 
easier for you 
> if I carried you?"
